Sacml

01 Jan 2021 - navasai

SENTIMENT ANALYSIS OF CODE-MIXED LANGUAGES, Team Leader, Jan. 2021

B. Tech Final Year Project. A Machine Learning model to predict the sentiment (positive, neutral, negative) of code mixed (Hindi-English) texts. Used CNN, LSTM and BI-LSTM models to predict the input texts. Got 65% accuracy on test data using CNN model. Other models gave 54% and 58% respectively. Google Co-Lab is used for training and development of models. Deployment is done using python based library called Anvil. Applications of this model are to filter offensive posts, comments and other text based content in social media.
